pages.text: Ko wano non. Nulaaɗo araali e ɓen adinooɓe ɓe, si wanaa ɓe wi'ay : "Ko mbileejo maa feetuɗo
Hara ɓe wasondir e ɗum? Ko woni kon, ɓee ko yimɓe bewuɓe
Runto ɓe, a felnaaki [e fiiaɓɓe]
Waajo tun; sabu waajagol ngol, hino nafa gomɗimɓe ɓen
Mi tagiraali jinna e yimɓe, si wanaa fii yo ɓe rewan
Mi ɗaɓɓiraa ɓe arsike; Mi ɗaɓɓaa yo ɓe ñammina
Pellet, ko Allah woni arsikoowo On, Jom cemmbe tiiɗuɗe
Haray hino woodani ɓen tooñuɓe, bakkaat yeru bakkaat nanndo maɓɓe'en, wata ɓe hawju
Bone woodanii ɓen yedduɓe, e nden Ñalaande maɓɓe nde ɓe kammbanaa
Mi woondirii [Fello] Tuuri ngon
E Deftere winndaande nden
e ɗeri fontaaɗi
E Suudu wuurniraandu ndun
E Kippoodi toowundi ndin
E maayo heewuno ngon
Pellet, lepte Joomi maa ɗen ko yanooje
Alaa duñoowo ɗe
Ñalnde kammu ngun dillirta dillere
pelle ɗen wona e yahugol
haray nden ñalnde, bone woodanii fennuɓe ɓen
ɓen wonuɓe e jumpugol, hiɓe fija
Ñalnde ɓe duñiroytee doole ka Yiite Jahannama duñannde
[Ɓe wi'anee] : "Ko ngee Yiite woni ko fennaynoɗon
